cards.title: The Sun
cards.upright_meaning: Radiant clarity dissolves the fog; celebrate the warmth that reveals your path.
cards.reversed_meaning: Glare blinds; adjust your pace before optimism burns you out.
cards.prompt_hook: Let daylight uncover the secret you almost forgot.

cards.title: The Moon
cards.upright_meaning: Dream-sense heightens intuition; follow the shimmering thread.
cards.reversed_meaning: Illusions ripple; ground yourself before chasing reflections.
cards.prompt_hook: Write a scene where moonlight rewrites the rules.

cards.title: The Star
cards.upright_meaning: Hope returns in gentle pulses; replenish and recalibrate your aim.
cards.reversed_meaning: Constellations scatter; remember why you wished in the first place.
cards.prompt_hook: Let a distant glimmer guide an impossible choice.

cards.title: Shifting Tide
cards.upright_meaning: Change swells; trust the rhythm pulling you forward.
cards.reversed_meaning: Undercurrents drag; anchor yourself before the next wave.
cards.prompt_hook: An incoming tide brings a message in foam.

cards.title: Glass Mirror
cards.upright_meaning: See yourself reflected with honest affection; alignment follows.
cards.reversed_meaning: Distorted echoes mislead; polish the surface before deciding.
cards.prompt_hook: A mirror shows the version of you who already chose.

cards.title: Quiet Ember
cards.upright_meaning: A small flame waits for kindling; nurture it patiently.
cards.reversed_meaning: Ash smothers spark; protect what remains from careless winds.
cards.prompt_hook: Describe the ember that outlasted the storm.

cards.title: Hidden Key
cards.upright_meaning: A solution is within reach; the right question unlocks it.
cards.reversed_meaning: Locks multiply; share the key or remain outside.
cards.prompt_hook: A key appears with a note only you can read.

cards.title: Forked Path
cards.upright_meaning: Two routes call; either leads forward when chosen with intent.
cards.reversed_meaning: Hesitation breeds detours; decide before the light fades.
cards.prompt_hook: Chart the crossroads and the guide who waits there.

cards.title: Gathering Storm
cards.upright_meaning: Energy crackles; harness it before release.
cards.reversed_meaning: Tension snaps; rebuild after the surge.
cards.prompt_hook: A storm speaks in a voice you recognize.

cards.title: Walled Garden
cards.upright_meaning: Protection and growth coexist; tend what you planted.
cards.reversed_meaning: Walls choke new shoots; open a gate for fresh air.
cards.prompt_hook: A garden reveals the promise of a future harvest.

cards.title: Hidden Whisper
cards.upright_meaning: A quiet clue arrives in time; listen with your whole body.
cards.reversed_meaning: Rumors cloud intent; confirm before acting.
cards.prompt_hook: Let a whisper rewrite the mission briefing.

cards.title: Luminous Gateway
cards.upright_meaning: An invitation appears; stepping through begins a new pattern.
cards.reversed_meaning: Threshold stays closed until you release what you clutch.
cards.prompt_hook: Cross a gateway that hums with stored memories.

cards.title: Fate Loom
cards.upright_meaning: Threads weave together; collaborate to finish the pattern.
cards.reversed_meaning: Knots tighten; patience and perspective untangle them.
cards.prompt_hook: A loom records the story you are weaving right now.

cards.title: True Compass
cards.upright_meaning: Direction clicks into place; you are oriented toward purpose.
cards.reversed_meaning: Needle spins; recalibrate with someone you trust.
cards.prompt_hook: A compass points to an unexpected ally.

cards.title: Restless Seed
cards.upright_meaning: Plant the idea now; roots will find their path.
cards.reversed_meaning: Dormancy lingers; conditions need tending before sprouting.
cards.prompt_hook: Describe the seed that refuses to wait.

cards.title: Companion Shadow
cards.upright_meaning: Sit with the unseen self; integration is insight.
cards.reversed_meaning: Suppressed fears leak through; name them to transform them.
cards.prompt_hook: Let a shadow tell its side of the story.
